\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 57681}

\subsection*{Recipe for Balls}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Sloth}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &   & oral & Nutmeg & extract\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 145.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
This is my recipe for nutmeg balls it makes its a hell of a lot easier to swallow and I get a little high while cooking it.



1) I grind up whole nutmeg nuts. 

2) I bring a small pan of water to a slight boil.

3) I pour the ground nutmeg in. I make sure there are no sharp chunks in it.

4) I boil the water off on medium heat until it turns into a gooey paste stirring occasionally. 

5)I quickly scoop it onto some cellophane wrap and roll it up.

6)I let the paste sit for about a day. 

7) I roll in to swallowable balls. Trip starts when my body begins to digests the nutmeg.

\end{document}
